title: Figure, "Sailor", ca. 1930
markings: underside: Dmitrov mark stamped in orange; 1818 impressed in clay; on top of base: undeciphered inscription.
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Man dressed in sailor's uniform, rests right elbow on a post, holds a telescope in both hands, stands on a square base; wears cap with red star.

tombstone.epitaph:
Figure, "Sailor", ca. 1930.
ca. 1930. Porcelain (bisque), enamel. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-163.
